short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Send message to your device from desktop/laptop

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to send messages to Telegram directly from Chrome, without having to switch to a separate app or tab. It's a quick and easy way to send message to your device.
